title: Photovoltaic properties of halide perovskites for solar cell application with efficiency greater than 18%

The opto-electronic properties and solar cell efficiency of halide perovskites A2LiInBr6 (A = Rb, Cs) are investigated using density functional theory (DFT) through WEIN2k and SCAPS-1D.
